pages.text: I ordered the crew to abandon ship. I was able to get the nav-coms to calculate a planet near the edge of this system. Maybe if our assailant thinks we are dead, it might provide us and advantage, should we make it out of this.

I instructed Mr. Michaels to destroy our thrusters, create enough smoke to mask the ejection of the escape pods. Once the smoke was at the needed levels, I made sure the scientists were ejected. Then Ms. Shuster, The Sargeant and Mr. Michaels.$(br2)I knew, it would be a close call, and launched my own pod.
